intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Rate your current self-care quality for each PLEASE element, explore suggested practices, and create your personalized plan.

pleaseElements.title: Physical Illness
pleaseElements.description: Treat physical illness and take prescribed medications.
suggestedPractices: Start a medication calendar and put a star in for every day you take all prescribed medicines as directed
If you are feeling unwell, make an appointment with a healthcare provider

pleaseElements.title: Balance Sleep
pleaseElements.description: Get adequate, quality sleep on a regular schedule
suggestedPractices: Create a 30 minute, no-screen wind-down routine before bed
Practice deep breathing technique in bed to relax

pleaseElements.title: Balanced Eating
pleaseElements.description: Eat regular, nutritious meals to stabilize mood
suggestedPractices: Eat every 3-4 hours; include protein, healthy fats & complex carbs
Drink 8 glasses of water every day

pleaseElements.title: Avoid Mood-Altering Substances
pleaseElements.description: Limit alcohol, drugs, and other substances that affect mood
suggestedPractices: Identify and plan to avoid your triggers
Practice urge surfing or opposite action when urges arise

pleaseElements.title: Regular Exercise
pleaseElements.description: Engage in physical activity that you enjoy
suggestedPractices: Take a 10 minute brisk walk after every meal
Dance to your favorite song to take a break
